about_the_game:
Please note that all characters depicted in this game are over the age of 18.

If you encounter a Curious Occurrence, please turn back.

If all seems as it should be, please proceed.

Something peculiar may be happening within the shop.

Game Introduction:

Keep your eyes peeled! Hidden within the seemingly normal are "Abnormalities," quirky shifts in reality unique to your experience.

To loop or not to loop? If you spot an Abnormality, retrace your steps to the entrance. If all seems in order, delve deeper into the store's enchanting depths.

Each correct decision spins the "RotationTurns" counter. Achieve 8 correct turns and unlock the coveted VIP Room, a haven of delightful secrets and exclusive rewards!

But the journey doesn't end there! Even after 8 turns, the loop continues to evolve, offering endless opportunities for discovery.

Features:

VR : Immerse yourself in the loop with SteamVR compatible headsets. Play seated or standing, adjusting your height for optimal comfort.

Performance Tweaks: Fine-tune your experience by toggling "Mirror Ball" and "Physics Calculation" effects without impacting gameplay.

Autosave: Your progress is automatically saved.

VR Controls:

Controller Sticks: Left stick for movement, right stick for direction.

Controller Grips: Hold to access the menu.

Controller Triggers: Select buttons and adjust sliders.

Should a flurry of unexpected anomalies arise, simply "Initialize" from the settings menu.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains content or themes that are appropriate only for adult.

Themes in this game include:
> Nakedness
> genitals
> lewd situations
> Brothel
> Explicit consensual sex scenes
> ejaculation

All persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

name: The Hentai 8 Turns

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10, Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Requires VR headset and controllers compatible with SteamVR.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
